detail_desc: Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece with a hood, zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Earrings in hammered metal with large, pearly plastic beads. Length 5 cm and 9 cm.
Soft faux fur slippers with appliqués and embroidery on the front, elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Thin metal chain necklace with a shell-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 43-51 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short soft jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and scalloped edges around the armholes.
Lightweight trainers in jersey with a motif and reflective details. Lightly padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a reflective trim on the uppers. Elastication at the wrists and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Soft Thinsulate™ lining. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. V-neck, wrapover top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats front and back for added width. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar and press-studs at the back and crotch. Scalloped edges at the collar and cuffs.
Jacket in a softly draping, patterned weave with a matt silk finish. Dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. No fasteners.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a small fabric appliqué at one end.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a small, padlock-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 41-47 cm. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Suede trainers with lacing, a lightly padded edge and tongue, mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.
Scarf knitted in soft chenille with faux fur pompoms at the ends. Size approx. 27x180 cm.
Soft, non-wired lace bras in lace with mesh-lined cups with removable inserts. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication under the bust and a wide lace hem. No fasteners.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and decorative ties at the waist, a fake fly, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a grandad collar, button placket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Flip-flops with plastic straps and fabric appliqués (sizes 7-9 with a strap around the heel) and fluted rubber soles.
Set with two hair grips and a pair of metal hoop earrings. The hair grips are decorated with plastic stones. Length 6.5 cm. Diameter of earrings 1.7 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in a textured weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length puff sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a detachable adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size approx. 13x27x41 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shorter jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and button at the back.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Calf-length trousers in a softly draping viscose weave with diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs. Covered elastication and a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Slippers with a hook and loop tab at the top, faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles in imitation suede.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Wide jumper in a chunky cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, turn-ups at the cuffs, and wide ribbing around the neckline and hem. Hole-knit section at the hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Lined jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with adjustable elastication and ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs.
Wooden hair brush with extra soft synthetic bristles. Length 18 cm.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and slits in the sides.

Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with gathers at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and a decorative knot detail at the hem.
Glasses chain in polished metal with silicone fasteners. Length 82 cm.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with worn details and adjustable straps. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Jumpsuit in ribbed cotton jersey with an open back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and straight legs.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting over the thighs for a fitted silhouette.
Hair grips in metal with decorations in the shape of a hamburger and fries studded with glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the hair grips is recycled.
Dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with short frilled sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Fitted, lightweight jacket in nylon with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Small stand-up collar that can be folded in and secured with a press-stud to form a V-neck. Press-studs down the front and side pockets. The jacket is easy to pack into the storage bag it is supplied with. Size of storage bag 10x22 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey. One with a chest pocket and appliqués.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, pleats at the front and fake front pockets. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft brushed inside. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication, and short, wide legs.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband at the back with wide, crossover straps and a high cut at the back.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs are decorated with glass rhinestones and one pair with a plastic bead and pendant.
Sleeveless dress with a cotton jersey top and woven skirt. Chest pocket, side pockets, and an elasticated seam and tie at the waist.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy, fine-knit wool containing some cashmere with long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a small imitation suede appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
T-shirt in washed jersey with a text print on the front decorated with studs and plastic beads. Roll-edge neckline, seam centre back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Cardigan in a loose, hole-patterned knit with long dolman sleeves and rounded front edges. No buttons.
